document.full_text: the recent surge in oil prices is no prelude to broader price increases that would force the federal reserve to raise interest rates, top fed officials said on thursday in what appears to be the predominant view at the central bank.
document.title: fed officials signal policy to stay on course
lines_and_colors: the recent surge in oil prices is no prelude to broader price increases that would force the federal reserve to raise interest rates, top fed officials said on thursday in what appears to be the predominant view at the central bank.
